title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 458.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 458.1 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the requirements for the provision
of residential placement services for adults. Residential placement services
for adults include: (a) arranging for
or providing assessment, placement, supervision or support services in
appropriate residential care programs which are licensed or certified by a

State agency to persons 18 years of age or older, who are physically or
mentally impaired; and
(b) activities to recruit, develop and supervise family-type homes for adults as
defined in section
489.2
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
458.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
